question.body: Which of the following is the most common type of synapse?

response.feedback: Incorrect. This is not even a possible synapse, because the action potential would only travel on axon of presynaptic neuron.
Correct. Most multipolar neurons have many dendrites that increase surface area for axodendritic synapses with multiple presynaptic neuronsâ€™ axons.
Incorrect. This is not even a possible synapse, because the action potential would only travel on axon of presynaptic neuron.
Incorrect. Axosomatic is a type of synapse but not the most common one.
Incorrect. Axoaxonic is a type of synapse but not the most common one.
